x_nuvo_diag_probes.description:
Areas to check for information
Interactive polyline is not properly translated or drawn on nuvolo floor mapper.
Check type of the polyline from DXF file. Only LWPOLYLINE is supported.
x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: Polyline compatibility check

sys_update_version.name: x_nuvo_diag_probes_e7d16494db3c51505f598b050596193b
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_nuvo_diag_probes"><x_nuvo_diag_probes action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Areas to check for information

Interactive polyline is not properly translated or drawn on nuvolo floor mapper.

Check type of the polyline from DXF file. Only LWPOLYLINE is supported.</description><healthcheck_type/><name>Polyline compatibility check</name><order>100</order><probe_type/><product_version/><remediation/><script><![CDATA[var util = new x_nuvo_diag.DiagnosticUtil();

var gr = new GlideRecord('x_nuvo_eam_dxf_entities_staging');

var gr2 = new GlideRecord('x_nuvo_eam_dxf_record_details');
gr2.addEncodedQuery('sys_created_on>=javascript:gs.beginningOfLast60Days()');
gr2.setLimit(5);
gr2.query();

var x = 0;
while (gr2.next()){
	var num = gr2.number + '';
	gr.addEncodedQuery('dxf_record_reference.numberSTARTSWITH' + num + '^graphical_objectSTARTSWITHLWPOLYLINE');
	gr.query();
	if (!gr.next()){
	x = 1;
}
}

if (x==1){
	util.handleOutput('The recent drawings uploaded from AutoCAD contain polyline types that are not compatible with Nuvolo Floor Mappers. Please ensure that all polyline types are "LWPOLYLINE" only when importing into Servicenow/Nuvolo.', 'Warning', 'Cad Extension');
}]]></script><sys_class_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jake.ye@nuvolo.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-15 19:48:24</sys_created_on><sys_id>e7d16494db3c51505f598b050596193b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>34</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Polyline compatibility check</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Diagnostic Tool" source="x_nuvo_diag">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Diagnostic Tool">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes_e7d16494db3c51505f598b050596193b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Stefan.Popov@nuvolo.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-17 11:21:34</sys_updated_on><tool>diagnostic</tool></x_nuvo_diag_probes></record_update>
